title: Is it possible to block ads from certain Developers?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I am a developer and I use Unity Ads in my game.
  • I would like to prevent the ads from certain companies from being shown in my game.

sections.title: Cause
content: The video ads of certain companies are seen in your game and you would like to filter out those ads.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Yes, you can. Contact unityads-support@unity3d.com and let us know what you would like to block and we will help you to do this.

sections.title: More Information
content: You can also filter your ads for specific genres. See this article for more.
